txt.en: While the Elves were long known as masters of lore, the Dúnedain of old were very near their equals in many arts.
Use Signs of Power or Battle
Use Wizard's Sigils to improve your skill.

At the height of their power, the ancient Dúnedain held great stores of lore, and unlike the Elves whose memories span Ages and thus commit little to writing, the Dúnedain wrote many volumes describing this lore. Most were lost in great calamities past, but some survive today and from these the Lore-masters learn a great deal.
